sec.div: 2.7. Effect of the Interventions on Blood Urea and Creatinine Levels
sec.p: H 2O 2 did not cause a significant change in the plasma creatinine as compared to the control. Blood urea is significantly increased in the group received H 2O 2, while in groups received H 2O 2 with Argan oil or Argan oil with Syzygium aromaticum essential oil, there was no change in the blood urea level ( Table 4).
